actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.
Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
House Committee on Armed Services Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to recognize the historical significance of the former presidential yacht Sequoia, and express support for her donation to the United States Navy by the Presidential Yacht Trust.

summary.text: Expresses congressional recognition of the historical significance of the former presidential yacht Sequoia and support for the plans of the Presidential Yacht Trust to donate the Sequoia to the U.S. Navy for service as the presidential yacht.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to recognize the historical significance of the former presidential yacht Sequoia, and express support for her donation to the United States Navy by the Presidential Yacht Trust.
